Package utils

utils package: containing useful classes and methods including I/O manipulation.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClusterTestMaker
    The class ClusterTestMaker produces synthetic test-sets for clustering algorithms, in file formats the DataMgr class in this package can read.
    DataFileAccessClt
    class implementing clients for requesting reading a range of vectors residing in a remote file in a remote file-system.
    DataFileAccessSrv
    The server is responsible for accessing data files residing in its local file-system (or any file-system it has network access to), according to requests it receives over the network via sockets, from DataFileAccessClt objects and returning the requested vector of popt4jlib.VectorIntf objects to the requestor.
    DataMgr
    The class acts as an I/O Manager class for saving and loading data for complex objects in the library such as Graph, HGraph, and properties HashMap objects.
    DataVectorChunk
    implements a place-holder for ranges of VectorIntf objects, that are chunks of vectors specified in a file, with the optimization that the place-holder holds only soft references to those chunks, for saving memory if needed.
    Debug
    A class to help in debugging of the code.
    DebugNR
    A class to help in debugging of the code.
    DIMACSASCIIFormatGraphFileMaker
    utility class that takes as argument a graph file and converts it into a file whose format is the DIMACS GRAPH ASCII FORMAT, or vice-versa.
    DLockCltJFrame
    Graphical client to the distributed lock functionality DLock[Clt|Srv].
    GraphPacking2MIPConverter
    Convert a graph (1- or 2-) packing problem to a MIP, in lp format.
    IntSet
    auxiliary class allowing comparison of sets of integers.
    KDDCup992NumericCSVFileFormatConverter
    converts a KDDCup99-formatted data file to a CSV file containing only numeric values.
    KDDCup992SparseVectorFileFormatConverter
    converts a KDDCup99-formatted data file to a sparse-vector format file so that it can be read from methods such as DataMgr.readSparseVectorsFromFile(file).
    LightweightParams
    helper class that allows searching parameters hierarchically by name.
    Messenger
    class controlling messaging to various output streams.
    Pair
    utility class holding pairs of objects.
    PairIntDouble
    utility class with the same semantics as the Pair class, but restricted so that the first object in the Pair is an int and the second a double.
    PairIntDoublePool
    The class is responsible for maintaining a sufficiently large array of PairIntDouble objects, and there will be a pool for each thread of execution.
    PairIntDoubleThreadLocalPools
    auxiliary class using the ThreadLocal mechanism to create thread-local PairIntDouble object pools.
    PairIntInt
    utility class with the same semantics as PairIntDouble, but holds two ints.
    PairObjDouble
    utility class with the same semantics as PairIntDouble except the first (key) object in a PairObjDouble can be any Object.
    PairObjThreeDouble
    utility class extends PairObjTwoDouble with a third double.
    PairObjTwoDouble
    utility class extends PairObjDouble with a second double.
    PairSer
    serializable utility class holding pairs of objects.
    Params
    helper class allows searching parameters in a map hierarchically by name.
    RandomAsgnMaker
    class responsible for creating (sparse) network assignment instances with positive integer weights.
    RandomBallGraphMaker
    builds the dual of the collision graph of an ad-hoc wireless network whose nodes have been randomly placed on the surface of a sphere.
    RandomGraphMaker
    builds the dual graph of the collision graph corresponding to an ad-hoc wireless network with nodes randomly placed in a normalized H x W rectangle, and with radius of transmission either constant or uniformly distributed in [r/2, 3r/2].
    RandomGraphMaker2
    builds a random graph, given the number of nodes and the average node degree in the graph (and optionally of course, the random seed).
    RandomGraphMaker3
    builds a random graph $G_{|V|,p}, given the number of nodes and the probability of any edge (i,j) existing in the graph (and optionally of course, the random seed).
    RandomStageGraphMaker
    builds random graphs that are "staged" between a source and a sink node.
    RareClusterEventsTestMaker
    The class RareClusterEventsTestMaker produces synthetic test-sets for Quantitative Association Rule Mining algorithms such as QARMA.
    RndUtil
    class controlling random number generation.
    SparseVectorFile2KDDCup99FileFormatConverter
    converts a sparse-vector format file to the KDDCup99-formatted data file so that it can be read from tools such as Apache Spark.
    WMaxSATFileMaker
    utility class that takes as argument a graph file and converts it into a file whose format is accepted as an input file for a weighted MAX-SAT problem solver.

Package utils Description

utils package: containing useful classes and methods including I/O manipulation.

Package Specification
